name: Chatty Burger
description:
Who said a Burger is speechless and emotionless? Now it can speak and express its feelings...

◉ Say something to me or sing and let me repeat that for you in burger style!

◉ Touch me to make me laugh!

◉ See how I can change my mood! (Excited, Sad, Normal, Happy)

◉ Record me in action and share with friends!
